alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:57PM CDT until July 22 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Itasca County in north central Minnesota... North central Aitkin County in east central Minnesota... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 356 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grand Rapids, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pokegama Lake around 400 PM CDT. Hill City around 440 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Haypoint, Split Hand Lake and La Prairie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
